message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. Given its features and benefits, I'm asking for $12,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. That's the maximum I'm willing to pay.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your position, but $8,000 is too low for me.  Could we meet in the middle at $10,000?
I'm not sure I can go up to $10,000, but I'm willing to meet you at $9,000. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
